name: Chess Club
abstract: The greatest strategy game of all times! Select a stunning environment and challenge your friends, our AI, or one of the millions of Chess fans around the world.

detail.app_languages: English, Traditional Chinese, Spanish, German, Japanese, French, Korean
detail.app_release_note:
CHESS CLUB 1.8.20 - TIME TO REMATCH - Jun 2023
----------------------------------------------

• Rematch: when finishing a multiplayer game, just press on “Rematch” and wait for the opponent to accept! This was highly requested, and here it is!
• Improved the AI difficulty balancing
• We fixed the Voice Activation feature
• Added visual cues when you are transmiting voice.
• Now you can also mute yourself
• New and better hands model when using Hand-Tracking
• Claiming a deserted game is now possible after just 30 minutes
• New pop-up window when your opponent deserts in a ranked game for you to claim it after 30 mins
• Multiplayer stability improvements
• Voice chat error during multiplayer mode was fixed!!
• Some minor visual bug fixing
  • Visual overlapping removed
  • Text corrections & Labels
  • Render priorities
• Some more fixes & improvements, as usual
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO Neo2, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO Neo2 Lite, PICO 4, PICO 4 Pro, PICO Neo3 Pro
